verses.verse: Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H7891>sang<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath triumphed <S%H1342>gloriously:<s%> <S%H1342><s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> hath he <S%H7411>thrown<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

The <S%H3050>LORD<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song,<s%> and he is <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation:<s%> <S%H2088>he<s%> is my <S%H410>God,<s%> and I will prepare him a <S%H5115>habitation;<s%> my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> him.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> <S%H4818>chariots<s%> and his <S%H2428>host<s%> hath he <S%H3384>cast<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> his <S%H4005>chosen<s%> <S%H7991>captains<s%> also are <S%H2883>drowned<s%> in the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
The <S%H8415>depths<s%> have <S%H3680>covered<s%> them: they <S%H3381>sank<s%> into the <S%H4688>bottom<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> a <S%H68>stone.<s%>

Thy right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> is become <S%H142>glorious<s%> in <S%H3581>power:<s%> thy right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> hath dashed in <S%H7492>pieces<s%> the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>

And in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of thine <S%H1347>excellency<s%> thou hast <S%H2040>overthrown<s%> them that rose up <S%H6965>against<s%> thee: thou sentest <S%H7971>forth<s%> thy <S%H2740>wrath,<s%> which <S%H398>consumed<s%> them as <S%H7179>stubble.<s%>

And with the <S%H7307>blast<s%> of thy <S%H639>nostrils<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were gathered <S%H6192>together,<s%> the <S%H5140>floods<s%> stood <S%H5324>upright<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> a <S%H5067>heap,<s%> and the <S%H8415>depths<s%> were <S%H7087>congealed<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

The <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H7291>pursue,<s%> I will <S%H5381>overtake,<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil;<s%> my <S%H5315>lust<s%> shall be <S%H4390>satisfied<s%> upon them; I will <S%H7324>draw<s%> my <S%H2719>sword,<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H3423>destroy<s%> them.
Thou didst <S%H5398>blow<s%> with thy <S%H7307>wind,<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> them: they <S%H6749>sank<s%> as <S%H5777>lead<s%> in the <S%H117>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is like unto <S%H3644>thee,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> among the <S%H410>gods?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is like <S%H3644>thee,<s%> <S%H142>glorious<s%> in <S%H6944>holiness,<s%> <S%H3372>fearful<s%> in <S%H8416>praises,<s%> <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H6382>wonders?<s%>
Thou stretchedst <S%H5186>out<s%> thy right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> them.

Thou in thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> hast led <S%H5148>forth<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1350>redeemed:<s%> thou hast <S%H5095>guided<s%> them in thy <S%H5797>strength<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>
The <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and be <S%H7264>afraid:<s%> <S%H2427>sorrow<s%> shall take <S%H270>hold<s%> on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6429>Philistia.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> the <S%H441>dukes<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> shall be <S%H926>amazed;<s%> the mighty <S%H352>men<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H7461>trembling<s%> shall take hold <S%H270>upon<s%> them; <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> shall melt <S%H4127>away.<s%>

Fear <S%H367><s%> and <S%H6343>dread<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them; by the <S%H1419>greatness<s%> of thine <S%H2220>arm<s%> they shall be as <S%H1826>still<s%> as a <S%H68>stone;<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> pass <S%H5674>over,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> pass <S%H5674>over,<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> thou hast <S%H7069>purchased.<s%>

Thou shalt bring them <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H5193>plant<s%> them in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> in the <S%H4349>place,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which thou hast <S%H6466>made<s%> for thee to dwell <S%H3427>in,<s%> in the <S%H4720>Sanctuary,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> which thy <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H3559>established.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> with his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and with his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them; but the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> land in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H8596>timbrel<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her with <S%H8596>timbrels<s%> and with <S%H4246>dances.<s%>

And <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them, <S%H7891>Sing<s%> ye to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath triumphed <S%H1342>gloriously;<s%> <S%H1342><s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> hath he <S%H7411>thrown<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5265>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the Red <S%H4480>sea,<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H5488><s%> and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H7793>Shur;<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4785>Marah,<s%> they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4480>Marah,<s%> <S%H4785><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were <S%H4751>bitter:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4785>Marah.<s%>
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H8354>drink?<s%>

And he <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3384>showed<s%> him a <S%H6086>tree,<s%> which when he had <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were made <S%H4985>sweet:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H7760>made<s%> for them a <S%H2706>statute<s%> and an <S%H4941>ordinance,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H5254>proved<s%> them,

And <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> thou wilt diligently <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H8085><s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and wilt <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and wilt give <S%H238>ear<s%> to his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> I will <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of these <S%H4245>diseases<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>brought<s%> upon the <S%H4714>Egyptians:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H7495>healeth<s%> thee.

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H362>Elim,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5869>wells<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> palm <S%H8558>trees:<s%> and they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
